We will fight on for the unborn and the brokenhearted," ' declared Republican Congressman Mike Pence at the 38th annual pro-life march. During the walk to the Capitol building, marchers chanted slogans such as, Hey, Obama, your mama chose life and waved signs proclaiming the value of life and the stark reality of abortion. the 38th annual March for life on the National Mall in Washington on Monday, Jan. 24, 2011.( AP Photo/Alex Brandon)- Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) told pro-life activists in Washington on Monday that a nation that will not stand for life will not stand for long.
